hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && mkdir -p docs/plans/ && git ls-files docs/plans/*.md 2>/dev/null | while read -r file; do filename=$(basename "$file"); [ -f ~/.claude/plans/"$filename" ] && cp ~/.claude/plans/"$filename" "$file"; done || true

cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && mkdir -p ~/.claude/plans/ && git ls-files docs/plans/*.md 2>/dev/null | while read -r file; do filename=$(basename "$file"); cp "$file" ~/.claude/plans/"$filename"; done || true
